name: Napalm Tapper
description:
Napalm Tapper is heavily inspired by Bally Midway's Tapper in terms of gameplay, but to add another degree of challenge, there's now four different flavors of soda. Satisfy thirsty customers by pouring their preference of Napalm Cola flavor, and slide it down the isle to them. Make sure you grab the empty glasses as they slide back to you!

Game Modes include:

  • Single player game
  • Two-player competitive game
  • Two-player cooperative game

Please rate and give feedback for #NotGDC2019!
